subject: Hiking
Mountains
Walking
Forests and Forestry
Wilderness Areas
lead_paragraph: Two miles past the lean-to and privy atop Fifth Peak, with their stellar views of Lake George, the trail winds through woods, around crags and up to a grassy bluff with an even more stunning vista.
snippet: Two miles past the lean-to and privy atop Fifth Peak, with their stellar views of Lake George, the trail winds through woods, around crags and up to a grassy bluff with an even more stunning vista.
